attributes.action: Offer Construction Workers the Covid-19 Vaccine after high risk groups.
attributes.additional_details: Construction has kept operating through the pandemic and we mix with large groups and travel nationwide we are being put at larger risk than the general public.
attributes.background: Offer all construction workers the Covid-19 Jab.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568313
